overview: Synopsis of the Tele film of the Year. Tells Jep, the head of the naughty boys in the village. One day in the month of Ramadan, as usual, he has done wickedness and has violated an old man and caused the old man to be seriously injured. When he was dying, the old man ordered and asked Jep to turn to be a good man.  Then the old man disappeared from the sight of Jep and Jep startled. After that incident, Jep was determined to be better and voluntarily guarded the welfare of a Surau with the permission of Imam Shuib. However, the members of Jep's group could not accept Jep's change. They sabotage and defamed him until he was hated by the villagers.  Jep wanted to prove that he was innocent and set the strategy to put back on his former gang. His efforts have been successful and Jep finally became the pride of the village community and was set as an example.
title: Sepahtu Kisah Tauladan
